a.detail:
Guillotine Blade: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +7 to hit against one target, 2d10 slashing damage

details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a stronghold. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has lain empty for many years until recently.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

east.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Strong Wooden Door (20 hp)
east.trap: One-way Door: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of a noble king, and opened by stabbing a sword into his back

detail.room_features: Part of the north wall has collapsed into the room, and someone has scrawled "Run away!" on the south wall

east.desc: Trapped and Locked Stone Door (DC 25 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.trap:
Ice Dart Trap: DC 20 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    +6 to hit against one target, 2d10 cold damage

east.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
east.trap:
Earthmaw Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +7 to hit against one target, 2d10 piercing damage

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp) (slides to one side)
west.trap: One-way Door: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable

west.desc: Trapped and Stuck Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 20 hp)

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Trapped and Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp)
east.secret: The door is concealed behind a pile of skulls

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and concealed within a mosaic of a legendary battle

east.desc: Trapped and Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)
east.trap:
Falling Block: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 13 save or take 2d10 damage

south.desc: Trapped and Locked Stone Door (DC 25 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
south.trap:
Ice Dart Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +4 to hit against one target, 1d10 cold damage

south.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 15 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Trapped and Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)
west.trap:
Fire Spray: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 20 ft. cone, DC 13 save or take 2d10 fire damage

west.desc: Trapped and Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)
west.trap:
Symbol of Hypnosis: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 11 save or become incapacitated for 1d4 rounds

west.desc: Secret (DC 20 to find) Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
west.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and concealed behind a pile of skulls

west.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Trapped and Unlocked Stone Door (60 hp) (slides up)
west.secret: A trap door in the floor leads to a short tunnel beneath the wall
west.trap: One-way Door: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable

detail.room_features: A stone stair ascends towards the west wall, and a tapestry of vile acts hangs from the west wall

east.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 15 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
Secret (DC 15 to find) Trapped and Locked Stone Door (DC 10 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.secret: The door is located several feet above the floor and opened by pulling an iron chain
east.trap:
Rune of Dread: DC 15 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 15 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

east.desc: Trapped and Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)
east.trap:
Arrow Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +6 to hit against one target, 2d10 piercing damage

east.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Unlocked Simple Wooden Door (10 hp)
east.secret: The door is concealed within the mouth of a gargantuan skull carved from stone

north.desc: Trapped and Locked Stone Door (DC 25 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
north.trap:
Ice Dart Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +4 to hit against one target, 1d10 cold damage

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Run away!" in blood on the east wall, and a charred wooden shield lies in the south-east corner of the room

north.desc: Locked Stone Door (DC 25 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
Trapped and Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp)
north.trap: One-way Door: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable

south.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 25 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

settings.name: The Lost Dungeon of the Demon Baron
